# Intro to spatial networks in R

`r emo::ji("point_down")`
Will be presented by Stephane Guillou


![](/./Upcoming events_files/steph_profile-resbaz.jpg){width=20%}





**Bio**  
St√©phane is a software trainer at the UQ Library, specialising in open research software and data analysis support. After a few years working in plant science and agricultural research, he joined the great Library team where he is able to promote Open Research practices to the wider UQ community.


**Workshop description** 
In this session, you will learn some essentials about processing and visualising spatial networks in R, using packages like sfnetworks, igraph, ggraph, ggplot2 and tmap, focusing on the more recent developments in the world of R Spatial.


**When** Thursday 31st March 2022, 2:30 - 4:30pm
